title: Mahakala
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: Image dipicting dancing Mahakala on the demon body with wearing crown of five skulls and long garland with demon heads holding fire bowl on the left and vajra on the right hand. Protector of Karma kagyu school.

title: Swetabhairab (white Bhairab)
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: Statue of  dancing sweta bhairab with wearing crown of five skulls and long garland with demon

title: Dukar (Sitatapatra)
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: Sitting statue of Dukar or chatra Tara hold parasol(Umbralla) from right hand and lotus in other hand. wearing long necklace, big earings and crown. Specially worship in Tibet tradition mahayan buddhism.

title: Maitreya Buddha
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: Statue of seated bodhisattva Maitreya on lotus base in dharmacakra mudrasana, wearing a royal garment ,crown and necklace.the left side holds stem of lotus with water pot (Kalasa) and in the right side dharma wheele symbol in lotus stem. Lower side with cloud decoration in both side.

title: Shakyamuni Buddha with two disciples
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: The painting of Shakyamuni Buddha in cross leg sitting position with bowl in lotus asana with two disciples Sariputta in the right and Mogallana in the left on the below register bhairawa associated with other two protective deities in left and right

title: arrangement of pictures in hall
subject: Buddhist Center Düsseldorf
description: In the centre of hall, Upper register right side,Thaye Dorje,17th Gyalwa Karmapa, Middle The 16th Gyalwa Karmapa Rangjung Rigpe Dorje, Left Side:Lama Ole Nydahl Middle register top layer karmapa in center left vajra right bell with vajra handle, below layer, Tara, shakyamuni Buddha and Maitreya Boddhisattva Left register right to left thangka of Milarepa,Karmapa and Kurukulle

title: Japanese Entrace gate
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: Japanese Traditional Main entrance gate for temple.

title: View of Japanese temple
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: Traditional looks Japense temple with shine in upper height, big bell in front of shine hall, japanese style pond with bridge

title: Crown Prince Shōtoku
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: Standing statue of Prince Shōtoku with holding book in his hand who had promoted Buddhism and Confucianism in Shintō milieu and brought new political, religious, and artistic institutions to Japan.

title: Amitabha Buddha
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: Depiction of standing Amitabha Buddha on a lotus with halo and Radiant circle from body (Prabhamandal). The right hand in varada mudra and left hand down.

title: Jodo Shinshu
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: Upper register  Nagarjuna and Vasabandhu (India), middle register from China:T'an Luan (Donran) Tao ch'o(Doshaku) and Shan Tao(Zendo) lower register Japan:Genshin and Honen

title: Hōnen Shōnin
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: Golden Decorated frame picture of sitting Hōnen on a mat with japanese tradition robe,religious reformer and founder of the first independent branch of Japanese Pure Land Buddhism called Jōdo-shū

title: Praying hall arrangement
subject: Eko-haus der Japanischen Kultur e.V. Düsseldorf
description: Arrangement of praying hall with stage with sitting chair arrangement displaying praying books and incense burning place. traditional japanese style.

title: Main Entrance of Thai temple
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: A entrance door on the center Buddha Head with halo and both side with clouds

title: Emerald Buddha (Jeda Buddha)
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: Statue of meditating Buddha made up with green emerald stone with crown and jewelleries. the sitting position with cross leg and right palm on the top of left palm. (Samadi Asana).

title: The Auspious Foot print mark of Lord Buddha
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: Panal dipicting the auspicious foot print mark of Buddha with side by side decoration of bodhi tree leaves design frame.

title: Shakyamuni Buddha
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: Statue of Sitting Buddha in meditation position with yellow cloth on the body.

title: Phra pratarnporn
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: Statue of meditating Buddha made up with silver  the sitting position with cross leg and right palm on the top of left palm. (Samadi Asana). traditational art from Luang phor Pae with craving asana with protective deities and lotus base.

title: Bhoomisparsa Buddha
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: Image of sitting Buddha with ground touching posture with halo. Representing the moment of enlighten from buddha gaya.

title: panal of different posture Buddha
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: Representing different posture thai style Buddha. left to right 1. sitting Buddha with mucalinda snake cover,standing Buddha, sitting Buddha, two standing Buddha, sleeping Buddha, walking Buddha, standing Buddha.

title: A setup of thai shine hall
subject: Wat Buddhasamakkee Germany
description: Setup of thai buddhist buddha arrangements in worshipping hall, with huge sitting Buddha backside, middle Enlighten  Buddha with halo representation Enlightenment for Buddhagaya,and in the front thai style samdhi Buddha with high asana . both sode decorative objects and front two candle and incense.
